entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 02:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
